documents.document: @gelukinmusic yeah I thought that too. Would want to be anonymous and also don't want to be all "ask me! I'm amazing! I know stuff!"
@Megapope I must learn your ways, oh wise one 🙏
@Megapope *whispers* I don't think he's realised he's agreeing with us?
@Megapope learned our actual history, studied pedagogy, and fuck me. We white folk fucked up but good. This is the least we can do.
@Megapope so as a white first-gen kiwi, I grew up mad that there were "all" these scholarships for Māori/Pasifika. Got to uni...
@Megapope by which I mean, that guy's argument is complete bullshit.
@Megapope you mean people who looked at the social and political landscape and wanted the best for their kids? Those mātua?
@gelukinmusic @DearMama_ @SpinoffParents just needs stuff about step-parents because I constantly feel other, alone, less than. Y'know?
@gelukinmusic @DearMama_ @SpinoffParents creates a space for everyone: parents, not parents, can't be parents, never want to be parents.
@gelukinmusic @DearMama_ she's fucking amazing and an incredible inspiration.
I'm gonna be late to @DearMama_'s book event and I'm going alone and 😅😅😅 it's gonna be fine I'm not panicking you're panicking
About to smash into my post-5pm work. I've been saving @Lin_Manuel's new playlist for this moment.
@johngreen @plated I am the same with our NZ based one. Makes being a working parent so much easier!!
Omg fuck yes. Although I'm also pulling for Agent Carter. Maybe we can have two Whos? https://t.co/MHNEsw8r0W
@_KitchenWitch mine expired a couple of years ago 😔
@liltoastfairy yeah, I know... I might have to go. And make husband also go.
@liltoastfairy I'll see... I've been working that late lately. And I was thinking about exercising tomorrow night...
@fibbyccino although, like, do they not have girls as well? Or are they all separated all the time?
Look: something lovely and heartwarming! Provided the planet is still here when it's released... https://t.co/h1TfLv5J5R

Just.
What the actual fuck?
Like, what the fuck?
@fibbyccino I saw the "add one/remove two" summary and thought "how the fuck do you implement that? And without spending a shit tonne of $?"
@amandapalmer and I desperately need some of your light and art right now. The world does. I signed up to Patreon last night.
Please sign this petition: https://t.co/uazJfM8kJ4 via @actionstation
@ayssoora @susu_george I'm sorry, what the ACTUAL fuck?
It's actually quite a relief to get to work and be able to not think about, y'know... *gestures vaguely at planet Earth*
@AtHomePundit I feel exactly the same
@NZRedCross got it sorted, so we're all set 😊
Best news I've had all day: setting up an ongoing donation to @NZRedCross, get an error due to server overloading. I'll just keep trying...
This is really easy to do... https://t.co/OS8XcpVZAL
This is my sister. I am the child of immigrants. NZ is an immigrant country. We needed to recognise, appreciate, em… https://t.co/NHhwkQLqVW
Anyway, donate to @NZRedCross folks. And if you ever have stuff, find out who locally needs it for resettlement. #RefugeesWelcome
Wonder whether the "we should take care of our own first" people actually do any active taking care of people in need. #RefugeesWelcome
@_KitchenWitch I inherited from a friend a pretty good apron from Living & Giving.
@_KitchenWitch misread apron as porn. Sadly don't have suggestions for either.
@farmgeek I've mostly been reading Twitter and crying. And getting angry. And trying to work out what I can do.
@PeterDunneMP @JaggyL @UnitedNZ and up it's funding to match... Or do it like Canada and allow communities to sponsor.
.@NZRedCross taught me that the word Islam comes from the word for peace. #RefugeesWelcome #MuslimBan #refugeefacts
. @NZRedCross taught me that the average refugee spends 19 years in a camp before being resettled. #refugeefacts #RefugeesWelcome
@liltoastfairy I thought "I'll just catch up on Twitter before doing my Sunday chores" and now I can't stop crying.
Fucking hell. What happened to our planet?
@gelukinmusic @Pomegranate_NZ @NeuAdso yes!! Exactly!
@gelukinmusic it's @Pomegranate_NZ lunch made by former refugees and delivered to you Wednesdays/Fridays. Trying to convince @NeuAdso on it.
@gelukinmusic you could start buying lunch through pomegranate kitchen as a way of supporting former refugees as well?
@fibbyccino hey, it's you!
@MumblingNerd that's always how I've used them, is there another way??
How did I not know about the #ThrowbackThursday Spotify playlist? This is excellent. #dancingatwork #FTW
@farmgeek I'd recommend not checking it. It'll only make you want to set fire to your hair...
@gelukinmusic my thoughts exactly
@ayssoora we already smashed a bag of burger rings
@ayssoora I am eating leftover Christmas cake 😖
@ayssoora oh I do that pretty much on the daily 😔
@ayssoora what?! Why?!?
I just... Like I really want him to read it? But also to know that it's not as creepy as it seems when you don't kn… https://t.co/kX3Xd6b5K6
@gurrlwithacurl @Megapope my friend has one. It's excellent. We need one, we break approx 1 kettle per year through overuse.
If anyone needs some cute in their day, check this thread: (totally giving me life on work-Friday-hell) https://t.co/UNjBtaBHOD
Turns out listening to rap makes me get my strut on *hard*. Slightly awkward when I'm just walking to the bathroom at work...
@DearMama_ please can you post both of those somewhere??
Common ground between incoming & outgoing US presidents is they work hard for what they believe in. But what one believes in is himself.
@Lin_Manuel it was when I saw it... I haven't learned all the Samoan words yet though 😶
@DearMama_ older stepson starts high school soon, younger starting intermediate 😭😭😭
@_KitchenWitch great! I've been trying to work it out for a few weeks now. Probably should have just googled...
@gelukinmusic excellent! I've heard that from two sources now, so I'll use that 😊
@_KitchenWitch really? Is that in use? That's a great word, it's awesome to say aloud!
Hey internet, is there a #gender neutral term for niece/nephew?
@Slaterlemley @hankgreen that is definitely what we get from our box: ingredients and recipes. We get the kids to do them too, so they learn
@Slaterlemley @hankgreen sorry, I could have completely misunderstood and be talking about something else entirely...
@Slaterlemley @hankgreen recommend checking out https://t.co/LNrJzE1jVH and https://t.co/2IJRoGVDxv to see what I'm talking about
@hankgreen @Slaterlemley plus healthy: recipes with meat and fresh veg, and it's all just delivered to us on a Sunday. So easy.
@hankgreen @Slaterlemley the benefit is we don't have to think about what we're going to cook every night. With kids, it's a total lifesaver
@hankgreen @Slaterlemley I don't know how they make it work but it definitely does here! We spend about the same as we would shopping but...
@hankgreen @Slaterlemley so then they started the cheaper one targeted at families and lower income. The flash one has GF options etc
@hankgreen @Slaterlemley they started a fancy one where you get a box with almost all ingredients & recipes. It was massive but too much $$
@Slaterlemley @hankgreen we have this in NZ, I get it for my family: https://t.co/2IJRoGVDxv it's excellent.
@hankgreen @Erin_Batura no for serious. The world needs this.
@AtHomePundit well fuck. Food for thought there!
@AtHomePundit agree. Perhaps why there's such a massive almost-dichotomy of reality TV and intense thought-provoking work?
@AtHomePundit aha! Do you think that's valid at all? I kind of don't agree with that at all. I'm not sure she saw the same speech I did.
@AtHomePundit that was Meryl's point. I still don't understand the other person's...
@AtHomePundit she didn't really talk about Trump voters at all. It was all about how we need to empathize with others and freedom of press.
@AtHomePundit oh. Weird. I just saw the speech (am at work) and she criticized people in power making fun of people with disabilities.
@AtHomePundit oh yes for sure! I see that. What was her point though? I didn't understand that either...
@AtHomePundit genuine question, I swear I'm not a troll, just not in America and sometimes don't follow
@AtHomePundit sorry, can you explain for me? I don't understand her point, and I don't understand yours either (and want to)
No really, watch it. https://t.co/ZEE7yfPLyJ
@kathsprout I had real trouble with mine then was immediately instructed to change it. Feel like I've been cheated somehow...
Uh. What the actual fuck? https://t.co/VgcjvepLXf
@gelukinmusic yep. And it's only just beginning... Yay for teenage boys!
@gelukinmusic he is revolting. I was like "don't your teeth feel furry?" Apparently that goes away if you wait long enough.
I mean, bright side, he did use all the underwear and socks. Just one pair of shorts, one pair of track pants, and two t-shirts. 10 days!!!

Just told him before he can touch any more of my furniture he needs to be clean. He washed his hands.
"SHOWER CHILD! WASH THAT FILTH OFF!"
Soap, toothbrush, toothpaste, shampoo, deodorant.... He also didn't wear most of the clothes we sent. #rpt
Before he left I quizzed him: "where's yr toiletries bag?" "In this pocket" "OK, I want u to try to use everything in it once per day" #rpt
Mr12 just got home from 10 days at scout jamboree. He didn't find/use his toiletries bag the whole time.
Please read. https://t.co/j4GfYGxTV4
@SisforStephanie yeah, someone I used to know in the UK. Just a shit day all round.
Death is shit. Fuck.
@AMidnightVoyage also my response. I love my husband, and my cat, and my pizza, and my wine, and ladies, and equality.
@JcastEyo @ayssoora yes, and also you should definitely watch The West Wing. It's worth the time investment.
So it's definitely summer.... Managed to get the backs of my knees as well playing mini golf this morning. https://t.co/ywhVpw1HRX
@ayssoora I just loved the bit where they solve a whole murder just saying fuck.
